Insurgents in the mountains have finally gathered enough men to launch a conventional offensive against government forces and their American allies.

The time has come! After months of preparation, our leader Akula announced today the beginning of our campaign against the government oppressors. Although we don't have much armor, our skill, dedication, and relentless fighting spirit more than make up for it. Our unit - Sotnya Tarasov - was tasked with an important mission: to capture the <marker name="airfield">airfield</marker>. First we capture some aircraft, then onward for a free Chernarus and the Motherland!

Getting rid of the Americans on the airfield may be the key to victory here. It won't be easy, but once we've seized the airport we'll have access to air support, not to mention the blow the loss of the imperialist American forces will do to the CDF.

Capture all settlements; destroy the main government forces (CDF) base by 08:00. Destroying the USMC base at <marker name="airfield">Vybor airfield</marker> will make things easier, but is not necessary.

Scouts confirm a huge American presence on the <marker name="airfield">airfield</marker> and in several sentry posts around the area. Government forces (CDF) are not yet present in the cities, but we can expect them to start occupying any settlements not protected by us in short order. If that happens, we must liberate them.
All proletarians, workers and farmers of the world support you! Hasta la victoria siempre!
Conquer country
Destroy Marine base
Destroy H.Q.
For too long the Russian invader has occupied our lands. Ivan strides across Chernarus as if it were his alone, but Brothers, tonight we fight back!

We are few in number now but there are many who would follow us. In every city or village there are men who will join our fight if only we can break through their fear. If we show them the Russians can be defeated the true men of Chernarus will leap to our aid. Of this I am certain.

It will be hard, brothers, we may not all live to see the dawn, but we will not go into the night unprepared. I have arranged for arms to be smuggled to the island of Skalisty. If you have no weapons of your own and cannot take Ivan's, you must take a boat to Skalisty and arm yourselves there.

Tonight we begin nothing less than an uprising. We will rally the true men of Chernarus and teach Ivan that we are not afraid, that we will fight and that we can win. Tonight in Elektrozavodsk and Vybor and Staroye and all the rest we will destroy enemy camps, we will crush that nest of liars and lackeys in the municipal office and we will free our people!
The municipal building in Elektrozavodsk is down, I repeat the municipal building is down! This is a great moment brothers! We've shown them what we're capable of, now it's their turn to be afraid!
A boat? Actually I did see a rubber boat on the coast the other day. Near the crossroads south of Solnichnyi, god knows who left it there.
Do I look like a fisherman? Don't answer that... Try the coast south of Solnichnyi. I saw a strange boat there recently. The coat by the crossroads.
Can't help you I'm afraid.
Get lost, I don't know anything about boats.
Boats? Well there's a old port northeast of Elektrozavodsk, along the coastal road. You could try there?
You want the port near Elektrozavodsk. Head along the coast northeast of there and you'll find it.
You going nightfishing? With grenades? Good idea! There's a boathouse on the sandbanks southeast of Kamyshov, you could try there?
Er... I think there's a boathouse southeast of Kamyshov. Sorry, not much help huh?
Boat? No sorry, no idea.
No I don't have a fucking boat! Piss off!
No boats here, sorry.
What would I do with a boat? I hate the sea.
Hey, know anywhere I could find a boat?
Hey my friend, I don't suppose you have a boat I could borrow?
Excuse me buddy, where can I find a boat?
Do you know where I can get a boat?
I need a boat, do you have one?
Thanks.
Yeah OK, thanks.
Uh right. Thanks a lot.
Brothers! We have triumphed! This is an historic dawn! Our great grandchildren will learn of this night at school!
Tonight we liberated our villages and crushed the enemy's stronghold. Our names will be remembered forever!
Brothers! We fought well this night! More than half of the villages are now free from the enemy.
It might not have been all we hoped, but it was still a victory! Let's celebrate!
Brothers. We have failed. We did not destroy the enemy's stronghold. We didn't free half of the villages we aimed to.
We failed miserably. But at least we are alive. We can fight another day!
Brothers. We have failed. We lost all the villages to the enemy. What a shameful night.
We failed miserably. I wonder why we even tried...
Brothers. We have failed. Our camp was overrun by the enemy. What a shameful night.
We failed miserably. I wonder why we even tried...
No! Not at all! I just meant we could help you later! With transport and the like.
We will soon be in control of this region Americans, it would help us both if we cooperate.
Think of it more as a warning. Things are going to get chaotic out here...
Is that some kind of threat?
We could be useful. We're only at the beginning Americans!
The uprising has just begun! You may find it pays to have friends on our side before to long...
No! Not at all! I just meant we could help you later! With intelligence report and the like.
We will soon be in control of this region Americans, it would help us both if we cooperate.
Think of it more as a warning. Things are going to get chaotic out here...
Is that some kind of threat?
We can give you information. We're only at the beginning Americans!
The uprising has just begun! You may find it pays to have friends on our side before to long...
Well help us kill them then!
Hey fuck you asshole. You don't mean shit to me. Now clear out of here before I get angry...
You might have a point there. Listen, how about we provide you with a little air support in exchange for support later on?
Say I let you call in three air strikes over the next two hours?
Then help us! You could give us equipment! Weapons!
We will soon be in control of this region Americans, it would help us both if we cooperate.
What kind of air support?
Deal!
We've got no love for the Reds, OK pal?
Well, don't you hate the russians too?
Halt! Who goes there! Friend or foe?
Advance and be recognised.
Who the hell are you?
We're Americans. Marines. What's your problem with the Russians?
Hey, no arguments here... If you're farmers why are you armed?
Boars, right... Big, vodka-swilling boars from Moscow, huh?
What do you mean by that?
Friend! Shit! Don't shoot!
We're just local farmers... you, you don't look like those bastard Russians...
They're invaders! They have no right to be here! No right at all!
We... uh... we're hunting... um, boar?
Something like that...
So, you're Americans huh? You, uh, you like hunting too? Maybe we could hunt together?
That's it, we've liberated our first town. There's no going back now...
Hey listen up guys! Little John was right! The people love us! The men from that first village are coming out to fight alongside with us!
That's the second town we've freed now. Things are really going great!
Well they just keep coming. We've got more volunteers from that second town.
Man, this is a national uprising! The people from that third village want a piece of the action!
I make that four villages captured. I never thought we'd get this far!
The fourth village is offering support too. I never dreamed we'd have so many so soon.
That's five villages freed! Five! We're invincible!
There are more men volunteering from the fifth village. But, do we really need them?
I never doubted him for a second. This is it guys, it's begun!
Yes! I knew this would work! Ivan is in big trouble! D: Three for three. Three towns captured. Nothing can stop us now!
We're on a roll now guys. The Russians won't know what hit them.
Yeah, it's incredible. I'm not sure I know what to do with them all!
Yeah, we'll take these guys on, but that's it! That's all I can handle! I'm not a general!
OK, I hear you. You're free to attack when ready, OK?
Nice work brother! One more to go!
Fantastic! Our supply lines will be safe now. Good work!
It's all yours if you can, yes. Good luck!
Hey listen up! I can see the Russian Checkpoint! Fucking hell this will be heavy!
Shit yeah! Wish me luck and we're going in!
Guys, I see the second Russian Checkpoint ahead. Should we take it?
Thanks! God I hope this works...
Yeah! We did it! We've got those bastards!
What now? Am I good? Am I good? Second Russian checkpoint is fucked down, you moron!
Of course, we need them. Money is for spending, right?
Yeah, thanks.
OK. Pleasure doing business with you farmboy. Hope you actually put them to good use. I didn't realize the foxes got so big around here!
Actually, we don't need them. Sorry to waste your time...
There! What did I tell you? Never trust a farmer!
Get out of my sight farmboy before I blow your brains out! You think I like being up at this time of the morning?
Go on piss off, or I'll feed you to my dog for breakfast!
I uh, I was told you had some weapons for me, us, um...
Who the fuck are you?
Yeah yeah, don't piss yourself, farmboy. We've got the extra special goods lined up for delivery to your base.
If you will like it, you'll be able to purchase it in the base.
Are you sure you really want them? They won't come cheap...
Eat that, Ivan!

Russian troops are concentrated in Elektrozavodsk. They have small garrisons in nearby villages, but they can be eliminated easily if caught by surprise. If we strike quickly Ivan will not have time to react, which gives us a chance to liberate several villages before he starts moving.

Old Martushak told us of some arms smugglers who may have toys for sale. Prizrak also thinks we should make contact with them, they are our only chance to buy decent weaponry. We certainly need better kit, we're getting sick of old hunting rifles.
There are many good people in the villages. We think they may join the fight once their villages are freed from Russian oppression.
We overheard some radio chatter and saw someone moving around Rog castle. It might be the same guys who abandoned their boat in Kamyshovo a few days ago, perhaps we should check what they're up to.

Excellent work, our enemies took a beating before sunrise, just as we planned. Russians all over Chernarus will see the smoke from their burning base in Vybor. The area around Elektrozavodsk is ours and we have captured a great deal of Russian equipment, vehicles and weaponry.
Marginal victory

Good work, brothers! We have shown Ivan our homeland won't come as cheap as he thought. Several villages are now in our hands. We just need to prepare defenses that will protect Chernarusssian citizens from the Russian threat.
Maybe next time
Unfortunately, we did not achieve our goals before dawn. However, the Russians are badly shaken by the fact we resisted at all, and this is good. The next night is ours, brothers!
Bloodshed
Our fight for freedom ended in tragedy, the bravest of us were slaughtered like sheep. We can only hope our brothers in the rest of the country do better, or we are all doomed.

The Russian Federation has deployed peacekeeping troops inside Chernarus 'to eradicate anti-Russian terrorists and protect the Russian ethnic minority.' After the catastrophic failure of diplomacy and subsequent US military involvement in Chernarus during early October 2009, the Chernarussian army was forced to withdraw from the Northern Province, now a de facto protectorate under Russian rule. The immediate reaction of nationalist hardliners was to begin a guerilla campaign against Russian troops. Sabotage, night raids and terrorist actions have become increasingly frequent. Now several guerilla groups are powerful enough to begin operations on a far larger scale...
Our homeland is overrun with foreign aggressors. Hiding in the mountains, the brave sons of Chernarus will return and make them pay.

Russian troops are concentrated in Elektrozavodsk. They have small garrisons in nearby villages, but they can be eliminated easily if caught by surprise. If we strike quickly Ivan will not have time to react, which gives us a chance to liberate several villages before he starts moving. Old Martushak told us of some arms smugglers who may have toys for sale. Prizrak also thinks we should make contact with them, they are our only chance to buy decent weaponry. We certainly need better kit, we're getting sick of old hunting rifles. There are many good people in the villages. We think they may join the fight once their homes are free from Russian oppression. We overheard some radio chatter and saw someone moving around Rog castle. It might be the same guys who abandoned their boat in Kamyshovo a few days ago, perhaps we should check what they're up to.
Destroy enemy base
The Russians have a main base in Elektrozavodsk, where they feel secure. The base is well defended, but if we hit them during the night, we have a good chance of upsetting that confidence.
Liberate the villages

Liberate the villages. The Russians are likely have small patrols on guard, but at this time of night most of them will be asleep. The sooner we free these villages, the sooner we can ask the locals to help us fight. We stand to gain more fighters and more supplies if we do this quickly.
Clear all Russian checkpoints

The Russians have set up two checkpoints nearby. One can be found at the crossroads North of Elektrozavodsk, the other is on the outskirts of Kamyshovo. Both checkpoints are manned by a small patrol and are equipped with HMG's trained in both directions down the road. We need to neutralize these fortifications to make sure our logistics will not be disrupted.
Blow up offices

Use any means to blow up the municipal office building on the main square in Elektrozavodsk. The Russians say Chernarus has a free and democratic government, but the suits are just puppets. Our 'leaders' are either forced to capitulate or else are opportunists who would sell their homeland. This morning, the municipal office building must be levelled in order to show the people of Elektrozavodsk we will not be falsely ruled. We hope to boost our numbers by convincing would-be supporters that we can deal both with foreign invaders and domestic traitors. We must bomb the building during the night to avoid civilian casualties - we are freedom fighters, not terrorists!
Eat that, Ivan!
Background info

Our homeland is held by foreign aggressors. The brave sons of Chernarus retreated to the mountains and will make them pay.

The Russian Federation has deployed peacekeeping troops inside Chernarus "to eradicate anti-Russian terrorists and protect the Russian ethnic minority." After the catastrophic failure of diplomacy and subsequent US military involvement in Chernarus during early October 2009, the Chernarussian army was forced to withdraw from the Northern Province, now a de facto protectorate under Russian rule. Our Intel suggests that after freeing a village from Russian oppressors, people will join our fight.</br>Find a boat to get to Skalisty Island to pick up some better equipment. You may find boats at the docks; ask people, improvise! Our scouts also saw someone strange at <marker name="Rog">Rog castle</marker>. See Scout report.

Eradicate all Russian forces, destroy their main base in <marker name="elz">Elektrozavodsk</marker> and free all settlements. A <marker name="obj1">municipal office</marker> in Elektrozavodsk needs to be bombed as a symbol of our resistance.

Russian troops are concentrated in <marker name="elz">Elektrozavodsk</marker>, they also have small garrisons in nearby villages. There is a delivery of smuggled arms ready for us on <marker name="smuggler">Skalisty Island</marker>; we need to make contact with the smugglers ASAP. The civilians are on our side and are likely to revolt and come to our aid if guided.

We overheard some radio chatter and saw someone moving around at<marker name="Rog">Rog castle</marker>. It might be the same guys who abandoned their boat in <marker name="Kamyshovo">Kamyshovo</marker> a few days ago; perhaps we should check what they're up to.

Russian checkpoint
Team Razor
07: Freedom Fighters
胜利
Defeat

We had to withdraw to our initial positions and await reinforcements. The local government forces outmanoeuvred our troops and we took heavy casualties. If the next attack fails this sector is lost. Friendly troops holding the coastline will start getting short on supplies within a few days...

Our troops have successfully taken the city without incurring major losses. Now that we've garrisoned Elektrozavodsk with friendly units we're free to exploit the breakthrough in the west. Your team has done well, comrade.
Bitter victory

Our forces have gained victory and inflicted major damage to the enemy. However, friendly militias also took severe casualties and are now combat ineffective. Despite those losses this mission was a success. Now our advance must slow while we prepare to defend the city.
Marginal defeat

We suffered too many casualties during the counterattack. The remaining friendly forces withdrew to the harbor to defend the position while awaiting reinforcements. It's another bad day in this accursed war.
Missing in action
Private Nikolai Alekseyevich Gorshkov: Missing In Action, October 12, 2009.
It's likely that Nikolai became separated from his unit during the initial move into Elektrozavodsk. His fate is unknown at this time.
日志
As a Russian motorized infantry group, repel a CDF attack on Elektrozavodsk.
Elektrozavodsk is being overrun by the enemy. Russian motor rifles storm the city to save friendly troops and counterattack.

The Russian peacekeeping operation in Chernarus continues. The <marker name="BIS_posHarbor">Elektrozavodsk harbor</marker> is currently held by ChDKZ Sotnya 2. The rest of the town is being captured by elements of the old government at this very moment. They are trying to outflank the <marker name="BIS_CdfMortarTargetNE">northern part</marker> of the city to encircle the harbor.

We will advance from the <marker name="BIS_posNorth">north</marker> and try to get to the <marker name="BIS_posHarbor">harbor</marker> ASAP. If we manage to achieve our mission objectives our troops will reassemble on the <marker name="BIS_posAssault">Western outskirts</marker> and take full, punitive advantage of the successful counterattack.
We must break the siege and try to reunite with ChDKZ Sotnya 2 who are surrounded in the <marker name="BIS_posHarbor">harbor</marker>.

The CDF force in the <marker name="BIS_CdfMortarTargetNE">north</marker> of the city primarily consists of BMPs and infantry units at reinforced platoon strength, backed up by some light mortars. Our troops (a mechanized rifle squad and a T-90 MBT) will advance from the <marker name="BIS_CdfMortarTargetNE">north</marker> and try to neutralize the enemy assets in town.
Molnya the CDF are on the run. Looks like you managed to drive them back, over.
Molnya the CDF are on the run! You managed to drive them back! Fantastic job, soldier!
Molnya we just got confirmation from our spotters. The ChDKZ group in the harbour have been neutralised, you didn't make it, over
Molnya this is Eagle, go ahead, over.
You'll have to make do without them Molnya. Launch the counterattack immediately. Drive the CDF out of town or destroy them, over.
Molnya this is Eagle, come in, over.
Molnya this is Eagle, do you copy, over?
Molnya this is Eagle, do you copy, over?
Move west out of town with your remaining units and regroup, over.
Molnya we are out of time. The ChDKZ are unreachable.
Yes god dammit! There's no time now! Move to you next objective. Proceed to the western part of town, make contact and engage the enemy, understood? Over.
Eagle out.
Molnya this is Eagle, copy that, what's your position? Over.
Copy that Molnya. Proceed. Make contact and destroy the remaining CDF units, over.
Copy Molnya. Proceed as planned. Make contact and destroy the remaining CDF units alone, over.
Well, there's nothing can be done about that now Molnya... Don't dwell on it. Get your head tight and regroup at the western edge of town, over.
Molyna this is Eagle, go ahead over.
All right Molnya, reinforcements are inbound, sit tight, over.
God dammit! OK Molnya, move you men. Fall back to the harbor and take up defensive positions. Call in reinforcements after you've secured the site, over.
God dammit! OK, move your men back north. Get out of there, over.
Sir, looks like we've got mortars falling in this area.
Copy sir, on it!
Eagle, we've taken heavy casualties, we are combat ineffective, repeat we are useless down here sir! The CDF are much stronger than anticipated, I'm recommending immediate withdrawal sir! Over.
Sir, we've taken heavy casualties. The CDF are much stronger than anticipated, request instruction, over.
Ah copy that Eagle. I just wish we'd made it to Chedaki in time - we could have used them, over.
Sir, the Chedaki suffered heavy losses, combat ineffective, they can't help us in the counterattack.
Eagle this is Molnya, we copy, go ahead over.
Eagle this is Molnya, go ahead over!
Eagle this is Molnya, go ahead over!
Copy that Eagle, out.
Copy that, Eagle. On our way. Out.
Eagle this is Molnya, come in over!
Eagle this is Molnya, message, over.
We'd better find those bastards and stop this. I'm getting a headache.
Sir, we made our rendezvous with the ChKDZ group. Proceeding to next objective, over.
Excuse me sir? We're just going to leave them there?
Well I'm glad you told me that soldier, here was me thinking you had gas... Everyone watch out and use cover.
OK, roger, out!
Copy Eagle, we're at Grid Reference 103135, taking up defensive positions.
Eagle this is Molnya, site reached, calling for reinforcements, over.
Copy that, sir. Out.
Copy that, Eagle. Out.
Gorshkov, get in that building and clear it. I don't want any CDF on my back.
Shit!... Copy that Eagle. Damn I'm sorry sir, we got bogged down. What are the orders, over?
Copy that sir! Out.
Ah copy that, thankyou, sir! What now? Over.
HA HA HA HA HA HA HA
Comrade Dorogin, good to see you. Pvt. Gorshkov said you'd be coming.
Hehe, rather him than you, eh comrade?
OK I see you Goshkov, where's the rest of your unit?
Ah, It's good you came! Thankyou. We'd given up hope.
OK, then we wait for them. I need to talk to your squad leader.
OK. Let's do it! Vasya, get hold of the guys guarding the cargo yard and order them to move west immediately.
Advance and be recognized!
Well that's just great comrade! Thanks. We'd given up hope.
Hah! I don't think so, comrade. There are too few of us left for an attack! We can't help you, sorry.
Who goes there?
Who goes there? Friend or foe?
Jesus come on Sarge, look at Gorshkov, he's scared to death as it is, go easy. Hey it'll be fine Gorshkov, don't worry. Unless you get shot of course...
I don't see why they can't break out themselves.
Yes sir!
Oh yeh? Well, you should be!
Private Nikolai Gorshkov, 365th motor rifles. I'm ahead of my men.
Hey I'm not scared, assholes!
They were right behind me, they'll be here any minute.
Brothers, it's a good thing you're still here!
Intelligence suggests heavy fighting in town so be advised, it's not gonna be pretty.
Damn it, OK. Well, in that case, stay here and hold the harbour.
OK everybody knows what to do. Let's clear this place up!
All right can it. We're approaching the city. Prepare to disembark!
Yes I've noticed this with Nikolai, always out in front...
Well, now you can get some retribution. Gather your gear, we're attacking the western part of town.
Russian army, 356th motor rifles. We're here to help.
Watch it Gulayev! We have our orders so just shut your mouth, understood?
Boys, we've got to move to the harbor double-quick. Our partisan friends won't hold out for long.
Yes, sir!
Your squad must push on and launch an attack to the west. We need to drive the Chernarussians from Elektrozavodsk once and for all.
Advance to the west
COUNTERATTACK

The CDF are clearly the superior force in this region. We need all units to fall back to the power plant north of Elektrozavodsk. Our troops have taken severe casualties and your unit is routed, it's now every man for himself.
Withdraw north
RETREAT

Although we successfully rendezvoused with the ChDKZ militia, the Chernarussian troops proved to be the superior force. Fall back to the harbor with your surviving men, take up defensive positions and await reinforcements.
Regroup in harbour
REGROUP
Your order is to search the city hall. There may be more Chernarussian soldiers hiding inside.
Search the building
SEARCH

The remnants of the ChDKZ unit Sotnya 2 are defending the harbor. Molnya must reach this position and begin a counterattack to the west. With the local militia to reinforce us, our troops should be able to punch through the CDF defense. Our spotters report CDF infantry units encircling the friendly positions, so move quickly.
Advance to the harbor
ADVANCE
日志

Yesterday I called my family and told them I'd be seeing action for the first time. My mother cried, but my father was very proud. He said I sounded like his father, my Gramps, who fought the Nazis in WWII. I think he was a bit in awe of me actually. It felt very strange.

I still don't see how helping the ChDKZ equates to fighting terrorists. NAPA bombed Moscow and they should get what they deserve, but why fight the CDF - the Chernarussian army? I don't understand it. Maybe NAPA is supported by the old Chernarussian government, who knows? They certainly don't bother discussing the politics of the situation with me! I'm sure the President is doing the right thing though. He would know best after all. It's just that from what I've seen so far, the ChDKZ look like terrorists themselves...
Mission plan

Elektrozavodsk harbour is currently held by the ChDKZ unit Sotnya 2. The rest of the town is being captured by elements of the old government at this very moment. They are trying to outflank the northern part of the city and encircle the harbour. Their force is made up mainly of BMPs and infantry units of reinforced platoon strength, backed by some light mortars. Our troops (a mechanized rifle squad and a T-90 MBT) will advance from the north and try to neutralize the enemy assets in town. We must break this siege. If we manage to achieve our mission objectives our troops will reassemble on the Western outskirts and take full, punitive advantage of the successful counterattack.
03: Counterattack
I don't know about that man, we're no partisans. I'll have to ask my squad leader.
Watch it! Friendly! We've got a ChDKZ soldier here, don't shoot!
Sure, we need every man we can get. Sarge will be happy, just don't mess up all right? Watch and learn my friend, we'll show you how it's done.
Who goes there? Hands up!
All right brother, thanks.
I'm with Bakunin's group, we were patrolling here when the CDF jumped us. They'd have got me too if you hadn't shown up. You are the reinforcements, aren't you? Should I stick with you now, please?
Don't shoot!
Well, well that's fine my by me! I don't need you! I'll just kill some of them on my own.
Yes, we need you.
We are not partisans.
Strike successful
The civvies got massacred during our action. Can't believe we're responsible for their deaths...
Undue casaulties
Someone from your team got killed. Today you failed utterly.
BRDM burns in Sobor, Brezina in hell. Time to celebrate our today's victory!
Brezina survived
We did what we could - managed to destroy the BRDM, but Brezina is still alive. I swear I'm gonna get him next time.
BRDM still operational
Brezina is rotting in hell, but we didn't manage to destroy the BRDM. Next time we need to come at them much harder.
Total foul-up!
I just don't know what happened... Everything went to hell...
Undue casualties
Extraction at pt. A
Extraction at pt. B

Those communist fuckers control almost the entire country. They've built a checkpoint in the nearby village - Stary Sobor - and now they're digging in more and more. Some of the NAPA guys and I decided it's gotta stop, right here. We're going to take out Jarda Brezina, a profiteer who collaborates with the commies, doing deals at our expense and helping them get their claws into everything. That bastard's always kissed the shoes of the rich and powerful, so it will be a good riddance. We also know the ChDKZ have a BRDM in Sobor. We want to take it out as well. Of course we're planning to shoot as many communists as possible too. The civvies, however, must not be harmed - except Brezina of course. Native Chernarussians seldom sympathize with those Red bastards. Yesterday in the pub we came to a conclusion. It wasn't easy to agree, but it's becoming more and more clear that the Yanks will ditch us, so we need to take things into our own hands. Since I have no real combat experience I'm the designated getaway driver. I've gotta get us out of there – any who survive. But I swear, if they call me Petya one more time... I'm nervous. Can't fall asleep.

The communists park their BRDM next to the church. They've built an improvised checkpoint there too. We have to destroy the BRDM by any means, maybe we can get close and blow it up with explosives or something. Things are bound to go crazy after the explosion so it's hard to plan. No doubt there'll be a firefight. We'll kill as many Chedaki and as few civilians as possible. We'll have to be quick though as the Chedaki will probably call for reinforcements.
Destroy the BRDM

The profiteer Brezina is hiding somewhere in the city - probably among his Chedaki friends who infest Stary Sobor. We have to be very careful. We know Brezina will help the Chedaki scum cause trouble today so he'll be up early. It's up to us to make sure he won't be successful. We'll see how much trouble he can cause with a hole in his head.
Assassinate Brezina
Extraction at pt. C

Petya will be in his car, waiting for our signal. There are three previously arranged extraction points - they're marked A, B and C on the map. Petya can reach any of them within a few minutes of our call. We just call him on the radio.
Extraction
Hastrman is waiting for us us near the water tower. He could have some information for us. We need to meet up and talk to him.
Hastrman

The communists park their BRDM next to the church. They've built an improvised checkpoint there too. We have to destroy the BRDM by any means, maybe we can get close and blow it up with explosives or something. Things are bound to go crazy after the explosion so it's hard to plan. No doubt there'll be a firefight. We'll kill as many Chedaki and as few civilians as possible. We'll have to be quick though as the Chedaki will probably call for reinforcements.
Destroy the BRDM

The profiteer Brezina is hiding somewhere in the city - probably among his Chedaki friends who infest Stary Sobor. We have to be very careful. We know Brezina will help the Chedaki scum cause trouble today so he'll be up early. It's up to us to make sure he won't be successful. We'll see how much trouble he can cause with a hole in his head.
Assassinate Brezina

Petya will be in his car, waiting for our signal. There are three previously arranged extraction points - they're marked A, B and C on the map. Petya can reach any of them within a few minutes of our call. We just call him on the radio.
Extraction
Hastrman is waiting for us us near the water tower. He could have some information for us. We need to meet up and talk to him.
Hastrman
简报
You're supposed to be NAPA fighters. You don't abandon your mission like this! Get back and fight!
MISSION ACCOMPLISHED.
MISSION ACCOMPLISHED.
MISSION ACCOMPLISHED.
MISSION ABORTED.
Civil war is raging. A small group of local guerillas decide to make the insurgents pay for their crimes.

Those communist bastards took control of <marker name="centerPos">Stary Sobor</marker> and now they act like it's their home! Yesterday my NAPA friends and I decided it's time to end this. We want to take out Jarda Brezina, a profiteer who collaborates with the commies. We also know the ChDKZ have a BRDM in <marker name="centerPos">Sobor</marker>, so we want to take that out too. In the ensuing firefight we plan to kill as many commies and as few civilians as possible.

We will attack from the <marker name="start">north</marker>. If we want <marker name="psycho">Hastrman</marker> to help us, we should contact him before the attack. We will approach the village and kill Brezina, destroy the BRDM and deal with any resistance. As my father said: 'A dead communist is a good communist!' After we're finished, Petya will come with his car to extract us at point <marker name="escA">A</marker>, <marker name="escB">B</marker> or <marker name="escC">C</marker>. We'll specify which one over the radio.
We want to kill as many communist bitches as possible - most of all Brezina. We also want to destroy the Chedaki BRDM.

Most of the Chedaki are holed up in the center of the <marker name="centerPos">village</marker>; however they're smart enough to have patrols around it too. Civilians are present in the village; hopefully no innocents will be hurt. A strange local called 'Hastrman' has offered us his support.

Sniper support - Hastrman, waiting near the small old waterworks.
Extraction - Petya's car
Bastard got what he deserved.
The thing is wrecked!
Great. Let's go kill some commies!
Petya, we need you at point A ASAP!
Petya, we need you at point B ASAP!
Petya, we need you at point C ASAP!
What's ASAP?
As soon as possible, you moron!
As soon as possible' what?
COME AS SOON AS POSSIBLE YOU IDIOT OR I SWEAR I'M GONNA KILL YOU!
OK, OK, on my way. And I'm not an idiot, jackass. Umm... Out!
You damn well are!
Oh, he's out. Jesus, we'll be lucky if he arrives at all.
Well I'm here guys, care to show up as well?
Now the fun starts guys. Good hunting!
Shit! Next wave of Chedaki coming in! Find some cover guys!
Hey Petya, what a miracle you really arrived!
Don't call me Petya, my name is Peter. I'm not a kid!
OK, that's all of us. Let's go, *Peter*! Good work making it in time, by the way.
How did you guys do anyway?
Lemmie have a cigarette and then we'll tell you everything, Petya.
PETER!
Yeah, right.
Die, motherfucker!
Die, motherfucker!
Die, motherfucker!
Die, motherfucker!
OK, we're here. Remember, these communist bastards have raped, robbed and murdered, they've got it coming, ok?
We all know exactly what they are. I just hope my father is still alive.
We all do. You know what's funny? Zbyshek is still on sick leave! You should be in bed Zbyshek!
Hey shut it, I'm officially sick. Just warn me if you see my Doctor.
Oh for crying out loud... Let's go.
Hi Hastrman.
Hi guys. I've been sneaking around for a while now. Got a few hints for ya. Like, for example, did you know that they park their BRDM near the church?
And the Chedaki? How many?
Around fifteen I'd say. Maybe more. They've built some sandbag fortifications near the church too.
What the hell is this? Stalingrad? All right, how do you picture this support thing going down?
You go in, pick a fight, I show up on the horizon and snipe the shit out of them. Got it?
OK... You better be a goddamn sharpshooter, my friend.
Don't worry about that. Now get going already.
Eat shit and die, you sons of bitches!
They drink, then shoot in the air for fun.
Oh, hello Zbyshek.
What a nice day, mr Doc.
So you're here too? I thought it was odd you taking sick leave for the first time in five years...
Well I... I feel better already, you know? You'll keep this quiet, won't you?
Are you kidding? Give 'em hell boys!
Will do, Doc. Thanks.
Hi guys! You here to fight the Chedaki? Are you NAPA or CDF? Doesn't matter, really.
Anyway, the Chedaki are guarding their ammo cache in that big barn over there. It is guarded, but could be worth checking out.
Wait a second, I know you asshole!
What? You better not be talking to me...
You're from Novy aren't you? I knew you were in cahoots with those imperialist pigs form NAPA!
Listen to me, 'comrade.' Shut up, or I'll shut you up - just like the rest of your kind here.
It doesn't matter. One day Chernarus will finally be free from the western oppressors!
Jesus Christ. I better go kill some Chedaki before my finger starts twitching by itself.
02: Eye for an Eye
1 - 4 COOP mission. Get inside the village, kill 3 bad guys, steal some documents and get out.
Decisive victory

Elements of the 27th MEU swept the insurgents from Utes effortlessly. The MEU may now safely prepare the ground assault on Chernarus and launch operation 'Harvest Red'. CDF troops can return to their bases on Utes.
Marginal victory

The USMC task force managed to take most of the desired territory but the operation was not a complete success. OPFOR units held out in key strategic areas and maintained control of several objectives. We will repeat the attack at dawn but this prolonged battle has cost us the element of surprise.
Assault stopped

The 27th MEU are in dire straits. The capture of the island was delayed thanks to a lack of initiative on our side and the determined resistance of the enemy. Contrary to the initial plan, command will now have to assign more troops to cleanse the island.
Defeat
American forces suffered a bitter defeat. The 27th MEU was unable to hold any territory or defend their command and logistical structures against the determined enemy resistance.
Background info

In August the Chernarussian Red Star Movement launched a large-scale counter-attack on government controlled territories. The island of Utes, home to a small CDF training regiment and coastal guard helicopter detachment, came under assault. 'Grupa Abramov', a ChDKZ insurgent group, captured Utes after prolonged and heavy fighting. After a final battle around the ruined church at Strelka the CDF were defeated and the ChDKZ began to reinforce the island. They currently use it as a base of operations, covering the southern coast of Northern Chernarus. The 27th MEU must retake Utes before they can launch operation Harvest Red.
Enemy base found west of Kamenyy. Destroy all OPFOR structures inside the base perimeter.
Destroy the enemy base
Intelligence report

We can expect reinforced-company sized opposition with no airpower and only light combat vehicles. These will be concentrated around key military installations or at posts in the urbanized areas around Strelka and Kamenny. Our Air Combat Element have denied the OPFOR precious air and sea supplies so we expect them to be low on ammo and materiel (although the military installations may yet contain significant supplies). There are no signs of coastal defences or minefields and the garrison is likely to be spread thinly across the whole island. Creating a bridgehead and holding it should be simple. The civilian population were expelled from Utes after the invasion so we are free to use all conventional force.
Mission plan

The first troops of the Ground Combat Element should establish a bridgehead on the southern coast of Utes at 0745 Zulu. You should set up an FOB and provide basic infrastructure for incoming units (LVSP, barracks, service point). After executing an assault on OPFOR units defending Strelka and seizing the infantry base north of the landing zone, you should advance north to the main OPFOR base. The main objective is the OPFOR command post situated somewhere inside the triangle running Kamenny - old CDF harbor – Kamenny harbor. You must capture all strategic locations and destroy the base before 1200hrs.

Our primary objective is to seize Utes island in the shortest time possible. The enemy is dug in at 3 military installations (infantry base, armor training base and airfield) and the villages of Kamenyy and Strelka.
Seize the objectives
Welcome to the war! US Marines are about to fire the first shots in their war on Utes, defended by small garrison of insurgents.

In August, the ChDKZ launched a large-scale attack on territories controlled by Government Forces. The island of <marker name="Utes">Utes</marker>, which housed a CDF training regiment, was assaulted by ChDKZ insurgents and captured after prolonged heavy fighting. Once the final CDF troops defending the <marker name="ruin">church ruins</marker> in the village of Strelka were defeated, insurgents began to reinforce the island, providing a base for their operations against the CDF coastal fleet. The capture of Utes island is a prerequisite for the ground invasion and therefore essential to the success of Operation Harvest Red.

Establish a bridgehead on the <marker name="start">Southern Coast</marker> of Utes Island, set up a forward command post and provide basic infrastructure for incoming troops (LVSP, barracks, service point).</br>As a first move, execute an assault on the OPFOR group defending <marker name="strela">Strelka</marker> and seize the <marker name="inf_base">infantry base</marker> North of the <marker name="start">landing zone</marker>. Advance through the <marker name="airport">airport</marker> perimeter and seize the hills around it. When the Southern part of the island is secure, regroup and advance North, where an OPFOR base is located in the center of a triangle formed by<marker name="kamen">Kamenyy</marker> - <marker name="CDF">old CDF outpost</marker> - <marker name="harbour">Kamenny harbor</marker>.
Our mission is to free the isIand, i.e capture all settlements and to destroy the enemy base before 1200 hours.

The Chedaki are concentrating around key military installations or in defense posts around the urbanized areas of <marker name="strela">Strelka</marker> and <marker name="kamen">Kamenyy</marker> villages. They are cut off from their sea and air supply lines so will soon run out of ammunition and supplies. The garrison is probably spread across the entire island. Civilians were removed from the island, so we're clear to use all conventional force.
Heavy artillery is not available, but you can request CAS at any time.
04: War Welcome

We have been granted temporary access to a Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV) as a recon aid. All I have to do is open up the map and select the target coordinates, or visually select a position in the world.
The Capture Progress Bar is now displayed near the top of the screen. Wait until it fills up to capture the camp.
Here you can buy gear, build defenses and barriers and respawn in multiplayer games. Field Medic tents are sometimes present also.
Capture more camps or the Supply Depot to capture the town itself. Let's be decisive. Go for the Supply Depot.
Capture the depot the same way you did with the Bunker. Note the more bunkers you capture around a town, the quicker you capture the Depot.
Great job! Now go for the rest – As you capture more towns you become stronger while weakening your enemy. Find the enemy base and destroy it to win the game.
Your task in Warfare is to capture all cities, find the enemy base and destroy it as per your commander's orders.
Your base now has a Barracks, use the 'Buy Weapons' Action to get better gear.
You may also buy units for your team at the Barracks by using the 'Buy Units' Action.
You can use the vehicles found in the base before the Light Factory is built.
You can now buy light armored units by approaching the Light Factory and using the 'Buy Units' Action.
Time for some action. Go to Map/Tasks, select Capture Strelka and press Assign Mission!
It is a good idea to capture the surrounding camps before trying to capture the town itself. Go to Strelka.
Eliminate all OPFOR units and get into the camp's main bunker.
This is the commander voting screen. Just leave the commander role to the AI for now. Close the window.
05: War Welcome
TF Fatman seized the village of Grishino and eliminated all OPFOR troops in the AO.
任务失败
TF Fatman was destroyed by OPFOR.
TF Fatman was unable to seize the mission objective within the required timeframe.
Task
Your mission will be regarded as unsuccessful if heavy casualties occur. Protect your troops and do not order single unsupported groups to advance.
执行计划

Advance towards <marker name="obj1">Grishino</marker> from the <marker name="blufor_start">NE</marker>. Use flanking manoeuvers to overcome any improvised defenses and use the vehicles for long-range fire support. As the Company CO is short on available backup, use of CAS is authorized should TF Fatman meets heavy resistance.
任务

The mission of Task Force Fatman is to advance towards the <marker name="obj1">village center</marker> and perform a sweep. All OPFOR presence must be eliminated before 8:30. Once this is accomplished, TF Fatman are to secure the area and stand by for reinforcements.
当前形势

Recent UAV surveys identified 3 fortified positions: near the coop farm, northern barricade, eastern barricade; OPFOR is likely to be concentrated around those areas.
The Grishino garrison consists of a squad-sized group of paramilitary gunmen (lightly armed) and a single light APC. There are indications of hidden MG or AT nests. There is a high probability of additional squad-sized elements armed with portable AT weapons covering the flanks and rear of the village.
HUMINT confirms a sparse anti-vehicle mine field at grid 061-052.
Avoid ordering the advance of vehicles through that area.
No civilians are present in the AO.
简报

Operation Harvest Red is success so far. Following yesterday's amphibious assault, USMC forces seized most of their designated objectives. TF Fatman flanked North and reached vicinity of <marker name="obj1">Grishino</marker>, one of the last strongpoints for fleeing ChDKZ insurgents.
Avoid heavy casualties
Task
Advance cautiously to Grishino and eliminate all enemy units holding the village.
Eliminate OPFOR
SEIZE AND HOLD
支援
A wing of two AV-8B attack jets is standing by for immediate CAS. Use standard target assignment procedures.
Village was captured.
Coordinate the attack of a reinforced marine rifle squad on an insurgent-held village.

Please check out the "SecOps" record in your diary for more information on how to use this feature.
Use your map to select a target location, or point out the target location in the world itself.

Secondary Operations (SecOps) are small secondary objectives which may be presented to you at any point by H.Q. They range from attacking an enemy location to rescuing the crew of crashed aircraft. It is up to a group's leader to decide whether or not to accept the SecOp. You are advised to check your map for additional information about the given SecOp. Completing the SecOp may result in benefits such as additional Support Requests.

Once H.Q. has briefed you on a SecOp, you can either accept it or decline it. Failure to make a choice will eventually result in the SecOp timing out automatically. Inform H.Q. of your decision by contacting them on the radio. Do this via the radio on your map or via the command menu.

Once H.Q. has briefed you on a SecOp you can either accept or decline it. Failure to make a choice will eventually result in the SecOp timing out automatically. Inform H.Q. of your decision by contacting them on the radio. Do this via the communications menu.
Support Requests can be granted by H.Q. and include artillery barrages, tactical airstrikes, supply drops and more. They can massively influence the outcome of a battle, so use them wisely.
Sometimes you are asked to designate a position in the world. You may do this by either selecting the position on your map, or by directly pointing to the position in the world and pressing %1.

01: 基础
<marker name="start">Starting position</marker>.

OK, so let's look at what we have here:
Foot patrol in enemy territory - check
Friendlies on mission in the same area - check
Base announcing pre-op they will give us mission updates in the field – check
The perfect recipe for a busy day...

Your team will be inserted by helo at the insertion LZ. Begin your foot patrol and stand by for mission updates. Your patrol will be successful when you have completed enough secondary ops as requested by HQ.
Your team will execute a patrol around the insertion point as a part of a reserve force in HQ's tactical area of responsibility.

The war began today at 0320 Zulu. Batallion-sized OPFOR and BLUFOR forces moved to contact; so far engagements of patrol elements are being reported across the whole AO. The front line is still not established, as both us and OPFOR employ mainly mobile units in order to gather intel. In the coming hours, the performance of units in this battlespace could decide the course of the whole conflict.
Support will be available and handled by HQ.
Lock n' load!
任意放置各种元素并开始完成多样化任务.
Lock n' load!
Look sharp marines, we're one click out from our LZ.
